summary.span: 表示与 关联的参数的集合以及各个参数到 中列的映射。

span.span: Represents a collection of parameters associated with a and their respective mappings to columns in a .

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该命令包含临时的 SQL 语句，而不是存储过程名称，是在集合中参数的数目必须等于的命令文本中的参数占位符的个数或 SQL Server 将引发错误。If the command contains an ad hoc SQL statement, as opposed to a stored-procedure name, the number of the parameters in the collection must be equal to the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, or SQL Server raises an error. 使用存储过程，必须提供在没有默认值的存储过程中声明的所有参数。With a stored procedure, all the parameters declared in the stored procedure without a default value must be provided. 声明具有默认值的参数是可选的。Parameters declared with a default value are optional. 这允许您指定非默认值。This lets you specify a value other than the default. 有关其他示例代码演示如何使用参数的详细信息，请参阅[命令和参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md)。For more information with additional sample code demonstrating how to use parameters, see [Commands and Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建的多个实例通过集合。The following example creates multiple instances of through the collection. 参数用于选择数据源中的数据并填充。The parameters are used to select data within the data source and populate the . 此代码假定和一个已创建与相应的架构、 命令和连接。This code assumes that a and a have already been created with the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

一个新的 对象。
A new object.
使用 方法的重载来指定整数参数值时，请务必谨慎。
Use caution when you are using this overload of the method to specify integer parameter values.
因为此重载接受 类型的 ，所以当此值为零时，必须将整数值转换为 类型，如下面的 C# 示例所示。
Because this overload takes a of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates.
``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ```
如果不执行此转换，编译器将假定您正尝试调用 (，) 重载。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler assumes that you are trying to call the (, ) overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将替换`SqlParameterCollection.Add`方法采用和。 replaces the `SqlParameterCollection.Add` method that takes a and an . 重载`Add`采用一个字符串和对象已被否决，因为可能存在多义性`SqlParameterCollection.Add`采用重载和一个可能是传递一个整数，其字符串的枚举值解释为参数值或相应值。The overload of `Add` that takes a string and an object was deprecated because of possible ambiguity with the `SqlParameterCollection.Add` overload that takes a and a enumeration value where passing an integer with the string could be interpreted as being either the parameter value or the corresponding value. 使用每当你想要通过指定其名称和值添加参数。Use whenever you want to add a parameter by specifying its name and value. 有关`Xml`枚举值，可以使用一个字符串，XML 值，派生的类型实例或对象。For `Xml` enumeration values, you can use a string, an XML value, an derived type instance, or a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `AddWithValue` 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the `AddWithValue` method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象提供输出参数中返回结果的存储过程的输入的参数。The following example demonstrates creating objects to supply an input parameter to a stored procedure that returns results in an output parameter. 该代码循环访问中的项，并在控制台窗口中显示某些参数属性。The code iterates through the items in the and displays some parameter properties in the console window. 此示例假定的有效连接字符串**AdventureWorks**示例数据库的 SQL Server 实例上。This example assumes a valid connection string to the **AdventureWorks** sample database on an instance of SQL Server. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameterCollection.Parent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameterCollection.Parent Example/CS/source.cs#1)]
